article.name: Posing Blossom
article.description:
This drawing of blossom was my first effort at drawing a powerpuff category in Macromedia Flash. I finally decided this was the best utility to be using.
I tried to give her a kinda autoriative pose, since shes the leader, however I think I did a better job with poses on Bubbles and Buttercup.
article.keywords: powerpuff, blossom, drawing, girls, ppg, bubbles, buttercup, cartoon network, john beech, mkv25, macromedia, flash
